The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Sir/Madam,
Please click here to download the curriculum information for all subjects for this Spring Term 2014. If you have any questions pertaining to the information contained in this curriculum letter, please contact the relevant teachers of each subject.
Key dates for this term:
January 20th – 31st Year 11 Mock Examinations
January 28th Tuesday ASAs begin
January 29th Wednesday ASAs begin
February 8th – 9th Weekend Honk rehearsals 10:00 – 16:00
February 10th – 14th Secondary International Week (Y7-10)
February 17th Honk Performance 6:00pm
February 18th Honk Performance 6:00pm
February 24th Half term holiday begins
March 3rd School resumes
March 5th ISM Maths Day
March 18th Tuesday ASAs end
March 19th Wednesday ASAs end
March 28th Y7-10 Interim Reports issued
April 1st IGCSE Options Evening 6:00pm
April 2nd A Level Options Evening
April 6th PTCs Y7-11
April 7th PTCs Y7-11
April 7th – 9th Year 9 Checkpoint Examinations
April 10th Secondary Swimming Gala (AM)
April 11th End of term – noon finish.
Please note that additional information regarding the above events will be sent out as the term progresses.
Kind regards
Mrs. Hamilton
Deputy Head of Secondary
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
